/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. Cars and bicycles are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life that unfolds here. A blue fence runs along the right side of the street, perhaps marking the boundary of a property or a park. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, where nature and cityscape coexist harmoniously.
